statements: SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count > 100
SELECT hashtag_name, trending_score FROM hashtag_usage_statistics ORDER BY trending_score DESC
SELECT hashtag_name, usage_count FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE trending_score < 0.5
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics ORDER BY hashtag_id ASC
SELECT MAX(usage_count), MIN(usage_count) FROM hashtag_usage_statistics
SELECT hashtag_name, usage_count FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE trending_score > 0.5 ORDER BY trending_score DESC
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY hashtag_name ASC
SELECT hashtag_id, trending_score FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count < 50 ORDER BY hashtag_id ASC
SELECT hashtag_name, usage_count, trending_score FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE trending_score < 0.3 ORDER BY usage_count DESC
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE trending_score BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY trending_score
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics;
SELECT hashtag_text, usage_count FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count > 100;
SELECT hashtag_text, last_used FROM hashtag_usage_statistics ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE trending_score > 0.5 ORDER BY trending_score DESC;
SELECT topic_name, trending_score FROM trending_topics WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics ORDER BY usage_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT hashtag_text, usage_count FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY usage_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE hashtag_text LIKE '%love%';
SELECT topic_name, trending_score FROM trending_topics ORDER BY trending_score DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT topic_name, last_updated FROM trending_topics WHERE trending_score >= 50 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage;
SELECT hashtag_text, usage_count FROM hashtag_usage ORDER BY usage_count DESC;
SELECT topic_id, topic_name FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM usage_statistics WHERE usage_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT hashtag_text, usage_count, usage_date FROM hashtag_usage, usage_statistics WHERE hashtag_usage.hashtag_id = usage_statistics.hashtag_id;
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage WHERE usage_count > 100 ORDER BY hashtag_text ASC
SELECT hashtag_text, usage_count FROM hashtag_usage WHERE usage_count < 50
SELECT h.hashtag_text, t.topic_name FROM hashtag_usage h JOIN usage_statistics u ON h.hashtag_id = u.hashtag_id JOIN trending_topics t ON u.topic_id = t.topic_id ORDER BY t.topic_name DESC
SELECT * FROM trending_topics WHERE topic_name LIKE '%tech%'

SELECT h.hashtag_text, COUNT(u.usage_id) as total_usage FROM hashtag_usage h LEFT JOIN usage_statistics u ON h.hashtag_id = u.hashtag_id GROUP BY h.hashtag_text HAVING total_usage > 5 ORDER BY total_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics;
SELECT hashtag, usage_count FROM hashtag_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM topic_trending ORDER BY trending_score DESC;
SELECT topic_name, topic_description FROM topic_details WHERE topic_id = 1;
SELECT topic_id, SUM(daily_usage_count) AS total_usage FROM topic_history GROUP BY topic_id;
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage_statistics ORDER BY usage_count DESC;
SELECT topic, trending_score FROM topic_trending WHERE trending_score > 0.5;
SELECT topic_name, topic_description FROM topic_details WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT topic_id) AS unique_topics FROM topic_trending;
SELECT * FROM topic_history WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic, trend_score FROM trending_topics WHERE trend_score > 100 ORDER BY trend_score ASC
SELECT user_id, hashtag_id, mention_date FROM hashtag_mentions WHERE mention_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY mention_date DESC
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT topic_id, engagement_percentage FROM topic_engagement WHERE engagement_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM hashtag_usage ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT hashtag, count, date FROM hashtag_usage WHERE count > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT user_id, mention_date FROM hashtag_mentions WHERE hashtag_id = 5 ORDER BY mention_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT activity_type, activity_date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT topic, trend_score FROM trending_topics WHERE last_updated > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH ORDER BY trend_score DESC LIMIT 5
